name: Samael the Legacy of Ophiuchus
description:
Samael one of the most beautiful and powerful commander of the kingdom of Nevaeh, where peace reigned for several centuries in total harmony.

As time passed in Samael himself, he questioned himself and his King the ruler of this immense kingdom if good could coexist with evil.

Prepare for the hardest game ever made.

Features:

- Epic Battles
- Support HDR
- Support PS4 Pro
- Dynamic Weather
- Amazing Graphics
- Gigantic Environment

Created and developed by Gilson B. Pontes.

Compatible with PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®4 Pro.

Remote Play requires PS Vita system and sufficiently robust Wi-Fi connection.

1 player
4GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Remote Play
